content.en: Seizure detection: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the detection and classification of epileptic seizures from EEG signals. They have investigated various algorithms, such as Particle Swarm Optimization with Support Vector Machine, Multi Wavelet Transform with Modified Effective Extreme Learning Machine, and Discrete Wavelet Transform with Statistical Pattern Recognition. These algorithms aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of seizure detection, potentially leading to better diagnosis and treatment for individuals with epilepsy.
content.da: Beslaglæggelsesdetektion: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre detektionen og klassificeringen af epileptiske anfald ud fra EEG-signaler. De har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer, såsom Partikel Swarm Optimization med Support Vector Machine, Multi Wavelet Transform med Modificeret Effectiv Extreme Learning Machine, og Diskret Wavelet Transform med Statistisk Mønstergenkendelse. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af anfaldsdetektion, hvilket potentielt kan føre til bedre diagnose og behandling for personer med epilepsi.
